short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Offers editors, journalists, and marketers insights into readability, SEO, social media traction, and H-structure analysis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimize your digital content strategy with Publisher Analytics Toolkit. This robust extension offers editors, journalists, and marketers real-time insights into readability, SEO, social media traction, and H-structure analysis. Craft compelling content, enhance your search engine presence, and engage your audience more effectively.
